page.title: 20BISHOP BURTON MOBILE SHOPS
page.content:
Bishop Burton is a small village which cannot support many shops or services. Many prefer the choice of the bigger towns such as Hull, Beverley and York. But some people without cars and old age pensioners find it difficult to travel far for shopping and it is these people who find the mobile services coming to the village so important. A{mobile library}comes every second Friday. A{butcher}visits twice a week and there is a mobile {baker, coalman and fishmonger.
The group which researched and wrote this information was made up of{staff {and students at Bishop Burton College {of Agriculture.
